official_title: A joint resolution to provide for the designation of the week of October 12, 1986 through October 18, 1986 as "Myasthenia Gravis Awareness Week".

summary.text: Designates the week of October 12 through October 18, 1986, as Myasthenia Gravis Awareness Week.
